name: flashkill
description: This browser extension aims to improve the user experience on for both players and spectators of the 99Damage league websites.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:remove-files && npm run clean:remove-tree
scripts.build:compile-ts: find src -type f -name '*.ts' | xargs --no-run-if-empty -t npx tsc --target es5 --outDir dist/scripts
scripts.build: npm run build:compile-ts && npm run build:copy-other

author: Timon Lapawczyk, Yannic Lapawczyk
